body_html:
The below works. Thanks @ahundt for updating the edit

  native.new_http_archive(
    name = "zlib_archive",
    url = "http://zlib.net/fossils/zlib-1.2.10.tar.gz",
    strip_prefix = "zlib-1.2.8",
    build_file = str(Label("//:zlib.BUILD")),
  )

body:
The below works. Thanks @ahundt for updating the **edit**


```
  native.new_http_archive(
    name = "zlib_archive",
    url = "http://zlib.net/fossils/zlib-1.2.10.tar.gz",
    strip_prefix = "zlib-1.2.8",
    build_file = str(Label("//:zlib.BUILD")),
  )
```
